name: 部署Minio组件
description: Minio是一个开源的对象存储服务器，可以用于存储和管理大量的数据

steps.name: 下载Minio镜像
steps.condition: sh -c 'if [ -z "$(docker images --format "{% raw %}{{.Repository}}{% endraw %}" | grep minio)" ]; then exit 1; else exit 0; fi'

steps.name: 传输Minio镜像
steps.condition: sh -c 'if [ -z "$(docker images --format "{% raw %}{{.Repository}}{% endraw %}" | grep minio)" ]; then exit 1; else exit 0; fi'

steps.name: 加载Minio镜像
steps.condition: sh -c 'if [ -z "$(docker images --format "{% raw %}{{.Repository}}{% endraw %}" | grep minio)" ]; then exit 1; else exit 0; fi'
steps.command: for image in $(ls /app/images/*.tar); do docker load -i "${image}"; done

steps.name: 执行部署
steps.command: docker run -d --name minio --restart=unless-stopped --network=host -v minio-data:/data -e MINIO_ROOT_USER=minio -e MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD=minio@dh123 minio/minio:latest server /data --console-address ":9090"
